frameworkDesc:
<sprite=0 tint>Defeat all the Shadows to gain 25 ChocoPower points.
<sprite=0 tint>Gain buffs based on the <color=#FFFC40><link="chocolate|1"><u>ChocoPower</u></link></color> you gain. ChocoPower is limited to 25 in this stage.

<sprite=0 tint>Each Shadow absorbs particular attributes. By fully restoring a Shadow's HP, gain 25 <color=#FFFC40><link="chocolate|1"><u>ChocoPower</u></link></color> points and defeat the Shadow.
<sprite=0 tint>Gain buffs based on the <color=#FFFC40><link="chocolate|1"><u>ChocoPower</u></link></color> you gain. ChocoPower is limited to 75 in this stage.

<sprite=0 tint>Defeat all the Shadows to gain 25 ChocoPower points.
<sprite=0 tint>Gain buffs based on the <color=#FFFC40><link="chocolate|1"><u>ChocoPower</u></link></color> you gain. ChocoPower is limited to 25 in this stage.

<sprite=0 tint>When you defeat a Shadow, the same Shadow immediately respawns. Gain 5 ChocoPower points upon defeating Inugami, 10 points upon defeating Quetzalcoatl, and 15 points upon defeating Lamia. Reach 40 actions to clear the challenge.
<sprite=0 tint>Gain buffs based on the <color=#FFFC40><link="chocolate|1"><u>ChocoPower</u></link></color> you gain. ChocoPower is limited to 75 in this stage.

<sprite=0 tint>Defeat all the Shadows to gain 25 ChocoPower points.
<sprite=0 tint>Gain buffs based on the <color=#FFFC40><link="chocolate|1"><u>ChocoPower</u></link></color> you gain. ChocoPower is limited to 25 in this stage.

<sprite=0 tint>When Amoribbon is defeated, Lilith will summon another Amoribbon. Defeat Amoribbon to gain 25 ChocoPower points.
<sprite=0 tint>Defeat all the Shadows to gain 25 ChocoPower points.
<sprite=0 tint>Gain buffs based on the <color=#FFFC40><link="chocolate|1"><u>ChocoPower</u></link></color> you gain. ChocoPower is limited to 25 in this stage.

<sprite=0 tint>Vasuki has different weaknesses and resistances than normal. All of its affinities are Resist.
<sprite=0 tint>You can use <color=#FFFC40><link="chocolate|2"><u>Love Bomb</u></link></color> by spending 100 <color=#FFFC40><link="chocolate|1"><u>ChocoPower</u></link></color> points. By using Love Bomb, you can change all of the target's affinities to Weak.
<sprite=0 tint>At the start of battle, you will have the total amount of ChocoPower points you earned in the previous 6 stages.
<sprite=0 tint>When Shadows use skills, they will steal 15 <color=#FFFC40><link="chocolate|1"><u>ChocoPower</u></link></color> points. When Vasuki's <color=#FFFC40><link="chocolate|1"><u>ChocoPower</u></link></color> reaches 100 points, it will spend ChocoPower to unleash Makajamaon against all Phantom Thieves.
<sprite=0 tint>Defeat Leanan Sidhe or Lamia to gain 25 ChocoPower points.
